summary: Tasked with modernizing FIS’s global Quote-to-Cash process through Azure-based integrations. Delivered 6+ end-to-end integrations connecting CRM, Billing and ERP. Automated CPQ, Billing, and PDF Invoice flows, partnered with business and architecture teams, and mentored junior product owners.
Worked with multi-region teams to automate RFQ-to-Invoicing workflows, deployed Salesforce CPQ integrations across markets, and built an effort estimation tool reducing manual planning by 30%.
Supported digital product team for Jagran.com and VishvasNews.com; conducted UX research & A/B testing; shaped roadmap decisions for 100k+ monthly users.
Redesigned artist collaboration journeys, partnered with marketing & tech to launch new features, increasing participation by 20%.
Translated user insights into product features for TimesJobs & TechGig, focusing on B2B platforms and customer experience.
Developed backend modules using COBOL, CICS, and IBM DB2 for European banking clients; maintained sub-1% defect rate for high-volume transactions.
